# uptimekuma_monitor_push (Resource)

Push monitor resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_monitor_push" "example" {
  name        = "External Push Event Monitoring"
  push_token  = "auto_generated_by_uptime_kuma"
  interval    = 3600
  timeout     = 30
  max_retries = 0
  upside_down = false
  active      = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Friendly name

### Optional

- `active` (Boolean) Monitor is active
- `description` (String) Description
- `interval` (Number) Heartbeat interval in seconds
- `max_retries` (Number) Maximum number of retries
- `notification_ids` (List of Number) List of notification IDs
- `parent` (Number) Parent monitor ID for hierarchical organization
- `resend_interval` (Number) Resend interval in seconds
- `retry_interval` (Number) Retry interval in seconds
- `tags` (Attributes List) List of tags assigned to this monitor (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tags))
- `upside_down` (Boolean) Invert monitor status (treat DOWN as UP and vice versa)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Monitor identifier
- `push_token` (String) Unique push token generated by the server. Used to construct the push URL: {baseURL}/api/push/{pushToken}?status=up&msg=OK&ping=

<a id="nestedatt--tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tags`

Required:

- `tag_id` (Number) Tag ID

Optional:

- `value` (String) Optional value for this tag
